paragraphs: All of our villas and rooms have their own unique charm. Ulaman offers a variety of luxurious accommodations, each designed to immerse guests in nature's tranquility and beauty. Our rooms and villas feature eco-friendly materials, luxurious comforts, and open-air living spaces that blend seamlessly with the environment.

Guests can enjoy private plunge pools, stunning views of rice fields and lakes, and unique architectural designs. Ulaman provides a harmonious blend of luxury and nature, ensuring a relaxing and unforgettable stay.
